properties.headline: Flood Warning issued March 2 at 3:15PM CST until March 3 at 10:48PM CST by NWS Bismarck ND
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the Cannonball River at Breien
affecting Morton and Sioux Counties of North Dakota.

.Warm temperatures will continue to clean the snow off the
countryside and contribute to the minor flooding along the
Cannonball River near Breien. .

The Flood Warning continues for
the Cannonball River at Breien.
* Until Tuesday evening.
* At 6:15 AM CST Monday / 5:15 AM MST Monday the stage was 10.1 feet.
* Flood stage is 10.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late
Tuesday morning.
* Impact...At 9.0 feet, Water overflows north bank.
* Impact...At 12.0 feet, Water overflows south bank.
* Impact...At 13.0 feet, Southeast part of Breien subject to
flooding.
* Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.4
feet on 03/13/2004.
properties.instruction:
Be careful when near, or on, the Cannonball River. Its ice is unsafe
and the cold water would present a life threatening situation if a
person were to find themselves in the water.

Icejams have not yet been a problem, but an icejam that quickly
raises the water several feet cannot be ruled out.

Forecast information is available under the Rivers and Lakes tab at
www.weather.gov/bis.

NWSheadline: The Flood Warning remains in effect
